 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַרְכֻבָּה‎</span>] **noun feminine** id. (by transposition; compare [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְכוּבָא‎</span>, <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**J**</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַרְכּוּבְתָּא‎</span>; Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 89</sup> (who &gt; explained from √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רכב‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex.194</sup>); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***); — plural suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַרְכֻבָּתֵהּ‎</span> [[Dan.5.6|Dan 5:6]] ***his knees***.
